result.detailedDescription: SEO software and tools empowering smarter marketing decisions and improved online visibility. They provide a suite of SEO essentials, including tools for keyword research, competitive research, link analysis, and rank tracking. Their offerings cater to digital marketers, agencies, and enterprises, providing solutions for local SEO management, SERP tracking, and custom data solutions. They offer free SEO tools like Domain Analysis, Keyword Explorer, and Link Explorer. They provide educational resources like the Beginner's Guide to SEO, SEO Learning Center, and Moz Academy. They offer subscription-based access to their software and APIs, empowering users to enhance their SEO strategy and AI models with custom data solutions. They provide solutions for businesses of all sizes, from small businesses to large enterprises, helping them to simplify SEO tasks, grow traffic, and gain a competitive edge in search. They offer a range of resources, including a blog, webinars, and how-to guides, to help users stay up-to-date on the latest SEO best practices.
result.shortDescription: SEO software and tools empowering smarter marketing decisions and improved online visibility
result.name: Moz

result.detailedDescription: Lucidya is a location based social media monitoring and analytics tool. Claims to analyze both current and historical social media content in real-time using its patented big spatial data search engine - SpatialSwift. Offers street-level location-based analysis using Hawk Eye. Provides real time alerts, competitive analysis and benchmarking dashboard, customizable dashboard and reporting.
result.shortDescription: Location based social media monitoring and analytics tool
result.name: Lucidya

result.detailedDescription: Xeneta provides a freight rate market management platform. It includes ocean and freight rate comparison, supplier negotiation, freight rate procurement, upload, benchmarking metrics, market intelligence and graphic visualization for freight spend analysis. It provides visibility into market freight rates so freight forwarders can procure the most competitive rates. It caters to suppliers, shippers, freight forwarders, carriers, and buyers. Its clients include Lenovo and L'Oreal.
result.shortDescription: Provider of a freight rate market management platform
result.name: Xeneta

Their offerings include mobile POS, QR code ordering, online ordering, business intelligence, and a marketplace for third-party integrations. They focus on providing secure and cost-effective payment processing solutions with features tailored for the food and beverage industry, such as tip handling and offline processing. result.detailedDescription: AI-powered pricing solutions to optimize price image and drive revenue. They offer a suite of tools leveraging data science and artificial intelligence to help retailers and brands manage their price image effectively. Their platform provides competitive intelligence, enabling businesses to understand market dynamics and optimize pricing strategies. They combine in-store audits, web scraping, and point of sales data to deliver a comprehensive view of the competitive landscape. The goal is to empower businesses to make informed pricing decisions, grow revenue, and increase shopper loyalty. They offer solutions for price image management, digital commerce intelligence, product linking, and self-serve data collection. They serve various industries, including retailers, brands, and convenience stores. Their platform helps businesses optimize pricing, track competitive pricing, and improve customer perception. They provide a SaaS, software solution that helps businesses with strategic pricing, trade promotions, and personalized pricing.

ReviewPro aggregates hundreds of millions of social media mentions, in 35+ languages, from hundreds of the most relevant Online Travel Agencies (OTAs), review websites and social media platforms. After operatin in the European market, the company has expanded internationally and quickly grown its client roster to thousands of hotels in over 80 countries, including Louvre Hotels Group, Meli Hotels International, The Red Carnation Hotel Collection, The Roger Smith Hotel, CitizenM Hotels and Apex Hotels.
